Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Beads
Description: Four perfectly polished elongated barrel-shaped beads found around the neck of a child. The central perforation was drilled from both extremities, though the hole deviates from the axis.
